# Riemann <a href='https://kyoustat.com/Riemann/'><img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="150" /></a>

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.com/kyoustat/Riemann.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/kyoustat/Riemann)
<!-- badges: end -->

**Riemann** is an **R** package for learning with data on **Riemannian manifolds**.

## Installation

You can install the released version of Riemann from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("Riemann")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("kyoustat/Riemann")
```
